name: Smasher and the Will o' the Thiccs
name_original: Smasher and the Will o' the Thiccs
description:
Golf meets girth! Slam your way through walls, and swell your way through stages, vacuuming the Will o' the Thiccs as you go!

  • 9 Main Story Levels
  • Over 60 extra objectives
  • Blueberry Inflation Mode to test your skills while constantly swelling up!
  • 2 Bonus levels to enjoy and have fun with!
  • Almost 400 unlockable Player Skins
  • Set the skins for the NPCs
  • Redesigned and refreshed levels
  • More to come with free updates!
